所以与中文汉子无关

[<ForbiddenMagic:StarBlock><draconicevolution:wyvernCore><draconicevolution:wyvernCore><draconice

volution:wyvernCore><draconicevolution:wyvernCore><ThaumicTinkerer:ichor><ThaumicTinkerer:ichor><

虽然我不知道神秘咋魔改，但你这语法错误实在太多了……落逗号，缺少引号……

mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.addRecipe("SKULLAXE",<ForbiddenMagic:StarBlock>,
[<ForbiddenMagic:StarBlock>,<draconicevolution:wyvernCore>,<draconicevolution:wyvernCore>,<draconicevolution:wyvernCore>,<draconicevolution:wyvernCore>,<ThaumicTinkerer:ichor>,<ThaumicTinkerer:ichor>,<ThaumicTinkerer:ichor>,<ThaumicTinkerer:ichor>,<ThaumicTinkerer:ichor>,<minecraft:workbench>,<minecraft:workbench>],
"Aer 200,Ignis 200,Aqua 200,Terra 200,Perditio 200,praecantatio 200,auram100,potentia 200,victus 100,humanus 200,instrumentum 100,fabrico50",<draconicevolution:dragonHeart>,9);复制代码给你修好了，至少在语法层面。
